metadata.title: CVE-2022-31088 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LDAP Account Manager (LAM) is a webfrontend for managing entries (e.g.users, groups, DHCP settings) stored in an LDAP directory. In versionsprior to 8.0 the user name field at login could be used to enumerate LDAPdata. This is only the case for LDAP search configuration. This issue hasbeen fixed in version 8.0.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
